description: Monitors K3s cluster using Prometheus Operator. Shows overall cluster CPU / Memory / ZFS Cluster Filesystem usage (Longhorn ZVOL) as well as individual pod, containers, network statistics. Uses cAdvisor metrics. Based on dashboard: 15282

panels.title: All processes memory usage by instance
Pod network I/O by instance (5m avg)
Containers network I/O by instance (5m avg)

title: K3S Cluster Monitoring for ContainerD with ZFS
